questions.question: Confirm the Equipment with below provided image.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm is there any physical Damage of the Equipment.
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230

videos.src: assets/videos/BPL US 9701/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET

questions.question: shift the Equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord continuity as shown in the video and confirm whether the power cord is defective.

videos.src: assets/videos/BPL US 9701/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CABLE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CABLE

questions.question: then replace the power cord with the new one
check and confirm for any cracks or Breakage in the Input power pin connector.
replace the input power pin connector with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check and confirm whether 230 VAC is available as Input voltage.
check for any loose connection or breakage of cable to the ON / OFF Switch.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
replace the switch with a new one

videos.src: assets/videos/BPL US 9701/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR REPLACING SWITCH.mp4

questions.question: check and confirm whether SMPS output voltage is available.
repair OR replace the SMPS board accordingly
repair or replace the Control Board accordingly
check and confirm whether any message as port 1 and port 2 probes are not connected appears on the screen or Display.
check and confirm whether probes are connected properly.
reconnect the probes properly
switch off the unit, connect the probes and turn ON the machine and confirm whether the message still appears.
open the equipment as shown in the video, repair or replace the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board
Video for replacing the control board – ULBPUS9701006

questions.question: check and confirm whether the cursor appears on the screen but there is no movement of cursor on the screen.
open the cursor ball lock, remove the ball clean the sensor control area and replace it back
Check and confirm whether the display appears blank or plain.
turn off the machine and turn it ON again. Confirm whether the issue still occurs.
replace the TV Board with a new one
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for further assistance through video call.
Thanks
